title: Uta AKA Poem.1972.DVDRip
description:
Poem is about a houseboy called Jun dedicated to meditation and strict, traditional lifestyle. His teacher sets off to screw him over, however, as he schemes to turn over his grandfather's mountain property to realtors so he and his brother can make a sum. Jun protests, but in the end fails to change anything. The message is obviously anti- materialistic, but also implies that in a world full of rotten people, faith is futile and won't get you far.
